markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Elude Trouble](/Feats.aspx?ID=2328) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=211" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 19 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Trigger**
A creature misses you with a melee attack.

</column>

---

You slip through your foe's opening. Stride up to your Speed. This movement doesn't trigger movement-based reactions from the creature that missed you.
name: Elude Trouble
